#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<set>
#include<cmath>
 
using namespace std;
#define S(a) scanf("%d",&(a));
#define SL(a) scanf("%lld",&(a));
 
typedef long long LL;
set<LL> s;
LL end = 100000000ll*100000000ll;
 
void precompute(){
    LL i=2ll;    
    LL limit = 10000ll;
    for(;i<=limit;i++){
        LL k=i*i*i*i;
        while(k<=end){
            if(k<=0)
                break;
            s.insert(k);
            k=k*i;
        }                
    }
}
 
int main(){
    precompute();
    LL n;
    int t;
    S(t);
    for(int tt=1;tt<=t;tt++){
        SL(n);
        LL sq = sqrt(n);
        LL cb = cbrt(n);
        if(s.find(n)!=s.end())
            printf("YES\n");
        else if(sq*sq==n || (sq+1)*(sq+1)==n || (sq-1)*(sq-1)==n || cb*cb*cb==n || (cb-1)*(cb-1)*(cb-1)==n || (cb+1)*(cb+1)*(cb+1)==n)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
